body:
Comment 4: 
I agree that the wording in the spec needs to call attention to the Go 1 backwards
compatibility right where the rule is defined. I think that a Go 1.1 compiler MUST allow
the unparenthesized func, and that's not specified.
_Labels changed: added **priority-later**, removed **priority-triage**._ _Owner changed to @griesemer._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
